item.description:
Happy hourers will hang once again at Coogan's in the Faneuil Hall area to imbibe social lubricants.

Trivia contest begins at 7 and we will win again.

Enjoy complimentary appetizers paid from our winnings. Get there before they're gone.

Coogan's Web Page

If you come hungry here's Coogan's Menu.
Great burgers. steak tips, and pizza.

Look for Pete and Stephanie because Tonya will not be there with her tiara, she'll be partying in Brazil.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: See Pete's photo (unlike Tonya's pic you can see his face).
item.why: Meet people who enjoy the pleasure of a good drink in a fun place with good food.
item.name: It's Thirsty Thursday, So It's Time For Coogan's Again
